column1: Geo-information Science and Earth Observation MSc
column5: INTERESTED IN A CAREER IN SPATIAL DATA SCIENCE AND BECOMING A GEOSPATIAL PROFESSIONAL?Geo-information and spatial data science are diverse fields that can lead to many different career paths. ITC educates students to meet the growing demand for highly valuable skills in the private and public sectors. We will provide you with the advanced knowledge and critical skills needed to lead in the field.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
